sentence: as we think back to 1994, and the step forward the iais represented for cooperation and coordination on insurance oversight, i think we can all marvel at how modest, relative to today, were the demands and the aspirations at that time for international standard-setting.

sentence: it was replaced by the fsb a decade ago because of the urgent need for a larger and more ambitious organization to deal with the global crisis that few had seen coming.1 that global financial crisis demanded a global response and the group of 20 (g20) leaders called on national authorities to cast a wider net for membership than the financial stability forum could offer.
